speaker: s01e08c01u001
line: Dehydrated Japanese noodles under fluorescent lights... does it get better than this?

speaker: s01e08c01u002
line: Question. You're not dating anybody, are you, because I met somebody who would be perfect for you.

speaker: s01e08c01u003
line: Ah, y'see, perfect might be a problem. Had you said 'co-dependent', or 'self-destructive'...

speaker: s01e08c01u004
line: Do you want a date Saturday?

speaker: s01e08c01u005
line: Yes please.

speaker: s01e08c01u006
line: Okay. He's cute, he's funny, he's-

speaker: s01e08c01u007
line: He's a he?

speaker: s01e08c01u008
line: Well yeah! ...Oh God. I- just- I thought- Good, Shelley. I'm just gonna go flush myself down the toilet now... Okay, goodbye...

speaker: s01e08c02u001
line: ...Couldn't enjoy a cup of noodles after that. I mean, is that ridiculous? Can you believe she actually thought that?

speaker: s01e08c02u002
line: Um... yeah. Well, I mean, when I first met you, y'know, I thought maybe, possibly, you might be...

speaker: s01e08c02u003
line: You did?

speaker: s01e08c02u004
line: Yeah, but then you spent Phoebe's entire birthday party talking to my breasts, so then I figured maybe not.

speaker: s01e08c02u005
line: Huh. Did, uh... any of the rest of you guys think that when you first met me?

speaker: s01e08c02u006
line: I did.

speaker: s01e08c02u007
line: Yeah, I think so, yeah.

speaker: s01e08c02u008
line: Not me.

speaker: s01e08c02u009
line: Nono, me neither. Although, uh, y'know, back in college, Susan Sallidor did.

speaker: s01e08c02u010
line: You're kidding! Did you tell her I wasn't?

speaker: s01e08c02u011
line: No. No, it's just 'cause, uh, I kinda wanted to go out with her too, so I told her, actually, you were seeing Bernie Spellman... who also liked her, so...

speaker: s01e08c02u013
line: Well, this is fascinating. So, uh, what is it about me?

speaker: s01e08c02u014
line: I dunno, 'cause you're smart, you're funny...

speaker: s01e08c02u015
line: Ross is smart and funny, d'you ever think that about him?

speaker: s01e08c02u016
line: Yeah! Right!

speaker: s01e08c02u017
line: WHAT IS IT?!

speaker: s01e08c02u018
line: Okay, I-I d'know, you-you just- you have a quality.

speaker: s01e08c02u019
line: Yes. Absolutely. A quality.

speaker: s01e08c02u020
line: Oh, oh, a quality, good, because I was worried you guys were gonna be vague about this.

speaker: s01e08c02u022
line: Hello? Hello? Oh! Rachel, it's Paolo calling from Rome.

speaker: s01e08c02u023
line: Oh my God! Calling from Rome! Bon giorno, caro mio.

speaker: s01e08c02u024
line: So he's calling from Rome. I could do that. Just gotta go to Rome.

speaker: s01e08c02u025
line: Monica, your dad just beeped in, but can you make it quick? Talking to Rome. I'm talking to Rome.

speaker: s01e08c02u026
line: Hey dad, what's up? Oh God. Ross, it's Nana.

speaker: s01e08c04u001
line: I just have to know, okay. Is it my hair?

speaker: s01e08c04u002
line: Yes, Chandler, that's exactly what it is. It's your hair.

speaker: s01e08c04u003
line: Yeah, you have homosexual hair.

speaker: s01e08c04u005
line: So, um, did she...

speaker: s01e08c04u006
line: Twice.

speaker: s01e08c04u007
line: Twice?

speaker: s01e08c04u008
line: Oh, that sucks!

speaker: s01e08c04u009
line: You guys okay?

speaker: s01e08c04u010
line: I dunno, it's weird. I mean, I know she's gone, but I just don't feel, uh...

speaker: s01e08c04u011
line: Maybe that's 'cause she's not really gone.

speaker: s01e08c04u012
line: Nono, she's gone.

speaker: s01e08c04u013
line: We checked. A lot.

speaker: s01e08c04u014
line: Hm, I mean maybe no-one ever really goes. Ever since my mom died, every now and then, I get the feeling that she's like right here, y'know? Oh! And Debbie, my best friend from junior high- got struck by lightning on a miniature golf course- I always get this really strong Debbie vibe whenever I use one of those little yellow pencils, y'know? ...I miss her.

speaker: s01e08c04u015
line: Aw. Hey, Pheebs, want this?

speaker: s01e08c04u016
line: Thanks!

speaker: s01e08c04u017
line: Sure. I just sharpened her this morning.

speaker: s01e08c04u018
line: Now, see, I don't believe any of that. I think once you're dead, you're dead! You're gone! You're worm food! ...So Chandler looks gay, huh?

speaker: s01e08c04u019
line: Y'know, I dunno who this is, but it's not Debbie.

speaker: s01e08c05u001
line: I thought it was gonna be a closed casket.

speaker: s01e08c05u002
line: Well, that doesn't mean she can't look nice!

speaker: s01e08c05u004
line: Sweetie, you think you can get in there?

speaker: s01e08c05u005
line: I don't see why not.

speaker: s01e08c05u007
line: Here's my retainer!

speaker: s01e08c06u001
line: I was just thinking. When my time comes-

speaker: s01e08c06u002
line: Dad!

speaker: s01e08c06u003
line: Listen to me! When my time comes, I wanna be buried at sea.

speaker: s01e08c06u004
line: You what?

speaker: s01e08c06u005
line: I wanna be buried at sea, it looks like fun.

speaker: s01e08c06u006
line: Define fun.

speaker: s01e08c06u007
line: C'mon, you'll make a day of it! You'll rent a boat, pack a lunch...

speaker: s01e08c06u008
line: ...And then we throw your body in the water... Gee, that does sound fun.

speaker: s01e08c06u009
line: Everyone thinks they know me. Everyone says 'Jack Geller, so predictable'. Maybe after I'm gone, they'll say 'Buried at sea! Huh!'.

speaker: s01e08c06u010
line: That's probably what they'll say.

speaker: s01e08c06u011
line: I'd like that.

speaker: s01e08c07u001
line: Hey, gorgeous.

speaker: s01e08c07u002
line: Hey. Look, I'm sorry about yesterday, I, um-

speaker: s01e08c07u003
line: No, nono, don't- don't worry about it. Believe me, apparently other people have made the same mistake.

speaker: s01e08c07u004
line: Oh! Okay! Phew!

speaker: s01e08c07u005
line: So, uh... what do you think it is about me?

speaker: s01e08c07u006
line: I dunno, uh... you just have a-a...

speaker: s01e08c07u007
line: ...Quality, right, great.

speaker: s01e08c07u008
line: Y'know, it's a shame, because you and Lowell would've made a great couple.

speaker: s01e08c07u009
line: Lowell? Financial Services' Lowell, that's who you saw me with?

speaker: s01e08c07u010
line: What? He's cute!

speaker: s01e08c07u011
line: Well, yeah... 's'no Brian in Payroll.

speaker: s01e08c07u012
line: Is Brian...?

speaker: s01e08c07u013
line: No! Uh, I d'know! The point is, if you were gonna set me up with someone, I'd like to think you'd set me up with someone like him.

speaker: s01e08c07u014
line: Well, I think Brian's a little out of your league.

speaker: s01e08c07u015
line: Excuse me? You don't think I could get a Brian? Because I could get a Brian. Believe you me. ...I'm really not.

speaker: s01e08c08u001
line: This one?

speaker: s01e08c08u002
line: No.

speaker: s01e08c08u003
line: I have shown you everything we have. Unless you want your mother to spend eternity in a lemon yellow pant-suit, go with the burgundy.

speaker: s01e08c08u004
line: You know, whatever we pick, she would've told us it's the wrong one.

speaker: s01e08c08u005
line: You're right. We'll go with the burgundy.

speaker: s01e08c08u006
line: Oh! A fine choice. I'm coming out.

speaker: s01e08c08u007
line: Wait! We need shoes!

speaker: s01e08c08u009
line: Okay. Um, how about these?

speaker: s01e08c08u010
line: That's really a day shoe.

speaker: s01e08c08u011
line: And where she's going everyone else'll be dressier?

speaker: s01e08c08u012
line: Could we see something in a slimmer heel?

speaker: s01e08c08u013
line: Okay, I have nothing in an evening shoe in the burgundy. I can show you something in a silver that may work.

speaker: s01e08c08u014
line: No, it really should be burgundy.

speaker: s01e08c08u015
line: Mm. Unless we go with a different dress?

speaker: s01e08c08u016
line: No! Nonono, wait a sec. I may have something in the back.

speaker: s01e08c08u018
line: Oh my God..

speaker: s01e08c08u019
line: Is everything all right, dear?

speaker: s01e08c08u020
line: Yeah, just... just Nana stuff.

speaker: s01e08c09u001
line: How we doing, you guys ready?

speaker: s01e08c09u002
line: Mom already called this morning to remind me not to wear my hair up. Did you know my ears are not my best feature?

speaker: s01e08c09u003
line: Some days it's all I can think about.

speaker: s01e08c09u004
line: Hi, sorry I'm late, I couldn't find my bearings.

speaker: s01e08c09u005
line: Oh, you-you mean your earrings?

speaker: s01e08c09u006
line: What'd I say?

speaker: s01e08c09u007
line: Hm-m.

speaker: s01e08c09u008
line: Are these the shoes?

speaker: s01e08c09u009
line: Yes. Paolo sent them from Italy.

speaker: s01e08c09u010
line: What, we-uh- we don't have shoes here, or...?

speaker: s01e08c09u011
line: Morning. We ready to go?

speaker: s01e08c09u012
line: Well, don't we look nice all dressed up?...It's stuff like that, isn't it?

speaker: s01e08c10u001
line: It was a really beautiful service.

speaker: s01e08c10u002
line: It really was. Oh, c'mere, sweetheart. Y'know, I think it might be time for you to start using night cream.

speaker: s01e08c10u004
line: What?

speaker: s01e08c10u005
line: Nothing, just your overcoat sounds remarkably like Brent Mussberger.

speaker: s01e08c10u006
line: Check it out, Giants-Cowboys.

speaker: s01e08c10u007
line: You're watching a football game at a funeral?

speaker: s01e08c10u008
line: No, it's the pre-game. I'm gonna watch it at the reception.

speaker: s01e08c10u009
line: You are a frightening, frightening man.

speaker: s01e08c10u011
line: Oh no! My new Paolo shoes!

speaker: s01e08c10u012
line: Oh, I hope they're not ruined.

speaker: s01e08c10u013
line: God, what a great day. ...What? Weather-wise!

speaker: s01e08c10u014
line: I know, uh, the air, the-the trees... even though Nana's gone there's, there's something almost, uh- I dunno, almost life-aff-

speaker: s01e08c10u015
line: God! Ross!

speaker: s01e08c10u016
line: I'm fine. Just-just... having my worst fear realised...

speaker: s01e08c12u001
line: Hey, who's this little naked guy?

speaker: s01e08c12u002
line: That little naked guy would be me.

speaker: s01e08c12u003
line: Aww, look at the little thing.

speaker: s01e08c12u004
line: Yes, yes, fine, that is my penis. Can we be grown-ups now?

speaker: s01e08c12u005
line: Who are those people?

speaker: s01e08c12u006
line: Got me.

speaker: s01e08c12u007
line: Oh, that's Nana, right there in the middle. 'Me and the gang at Java Joe's'.

speaker: s01e08c12u008
line: Wow, Monica, you look just like your grandmother. How old was she there?

speaker: s01e08c12u009
line: Let's see, 1939... yeah, 24, 25?

speaker: s01e08c12u010
line: Looks like a fun gang.

speaker: s01e08c12u011
line: Ooh, look-look-look-look-look! I got Monica naked!

speaker: s01e08c12u012
line: Nono, that would be me again. I'm, uh, just trying something.

speaker: s01e08c13u001
line: Hey, Lowell.

speaker: s01e08c13u002
line: Hey, Chandler.

speaker: s01e08c13u003
line: So how's it going there in Financial Services?

speaker: s01e08c13u004
line: It's like Mardi Gras without the paper mache heads. How 'bout you?

speaker: s01e08c13u005
line: Good, good. Listen, heh, I dunno what Shelley told you about me, but, uh... I'm not.

speaker: s01e08c13u006
line: I know. That's what I told her.

speaker: s01e08c13u007
line: Really.

speaker: s01e08c13u008
line: Yeah.

speaker: s01e08c13u009
line: So- you can tell?

speaker: s01e08c13u010
line: Pretty much, most of the time. We have a kind of... radar.

speaker: s01e08c13u011
line: So you don't think I have a, a quality?

speaker: s01e08c13u012
line: Speaking for my people, I'd have to say no. By the way, your friend Brian from Payroll, he is.

line: He is?

speaker: s01e08c13u014
line: Yup, and waaay out of your league.

line: Out of my league. I could get a Brian. If I wanted to get a Brian, I could get a Brian. Hey, Brian.
